name: Add-to-cart modal reappears after page refresh

steps.name: Given  I open the menu page
Right‑click cup body → open Add‑to‑Cart modal
Right‑click cup body → open Add‑to‑Cart modal
When  I right-click the "Americano" card again
Right‑click cup body → open Add‑to‑Cart modal
And  the modal contains 'Yes' and 'No' buttons

labels.name: story
labels.value: Add-to-cart modal reappears after page refresh

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Add-to-cart modal reappears after page refresh
